metadata.title: CVE-2023-5474 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Heap buffer overflow in PDF in Google Chrome prior to 118.0.5993.70 alloweda remote attacker who convinced a user to engage in specific userinteractions to potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted PDF file.(Chromium security severity: Medium)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
